snippet.title: Karuppu (Tamil) - Teaser | Suriya | RJB | Trisha | @SaiAbhyankkar | Dream Warrior Pictures
snippet.description:
Here's the Official Teaser of "Karuppu" (Tamil), Starring Suriya, Trisha, Indrans, Natty, Swasika, Sshivadha & Others Music by @SaiAbhyankkar, Written & Directed by RJ Balaji.

Movie Credits :

Cast : Suriya, Trisha, Indrans, Natty, Swasika, Sshivadha, Anagha Maya Ravi, Supreeth Reddy and Others
Written & Directed by RJB
Produced by Dream Warrior Pictures
Producers : S R Prakash Babu & S R Prabu
Executive Producer : Aravendraj Baskaran
Writers : Ashwin Ravichandran - Rahul Raj - T S Gopi Krishnan - Karan Aravind Kumar
Director of Photography : G K Vishnu
Music : @SaiAbhyankkar 
Production Design : Arun Venjaramoodu
Editor : R Kalaivanan
Stunts : Anbariv - Vikram Mor
Choreography : Shobi - Sandy
Lyrics : Vishnu Edavan - Asal Kolaar - Arun Srinivasan
Stylist: Praveen Raja - Eka Lakhani - Divya Nagarajan
Costumes : Perumal Selvam
Make-up : Vinoth Sukumaran
Color by Redchillies.color
Sr.Colortist : Ken Metzker
VFX : Phantom
Sound Design : Sync Cinema
Sound Mixing : Kannan Ganpat
Stills : D.Narendran
Publicity Designs: Kabilan
PRO : Sathish S2 
Production Controller: Rajendran PS
Associate EP: Allaudin Hussain, Sathappa S
Promotions: Esakki Muthu K

Song Credits:

Music Composed, Sung and Produced by @SaiAbhyankkar 
Singers : @SaiAbhyankkar, Arivu 
Lyricist : Arun Srinivasan 
Additional Vocals : Mahesh Vinayakram, Arun Kaundinya, Yogi Sekar 
Synth , Keys and Synth Bass : @SaiAbhyankkar 
Additional Rhythm : Kalyan
Kumbaaara Rhythm : Yanka Percussion Group 
Moorsing : Mahesh Vinayakram
Navtar : Vishnu 

The Indian choral Ensemble:

Vanathi Suresh
Sivaranjini Chandramouli
Shri Badhra K A
Yazhini
Bavathayini Nagarajan
Varsha R Mallya

Mixed by @SaiAbhyankkar at YOLO records 
Mastered by Rupendar Venkatesh

Audio Label : Think Music

snippet.description:
Presenting the Third single 'Powerhouse' lyrical video from Superstar Rajinikanth's #COOLIE
Directed By Lokesh Kanagaraj & Music By Anirudh. 

#Coolie worldwide from August 14th 2025..üòé

Listen to the "Powerhouse" on your favourite music Platform: 
https://bit.ly/PowerhouseOnSpotify

#PowerhouseSong #CoolieSong #superstarrajinikanth #lokeshkanagaraj #anirudh #sunpictures #anirudhmusic #anirudhsong  #lokeshkanagarajinterview  #rajinikanth #anirudhravichander #anirudhmusical #cooliedisco #coolieteaser #coolieupdate #cooliemovie

Song Title: Powerhouse
Movie: Coolie
Composed by Anirudh Ravichander
Lyrics: Arivu
Vocals: Arivu, Anirudh Ravichander

Composed, Arranged & Programmed by Anirudh Ravichander
Rhythm Produced by Shashank Vijay
Additional Rhythm Programmed by Karthik Vamsi
Additional Music Programmed by Nivin Raphael, Arish
Horns  - That Boy Franco
Trumpets & Trombone - Rakesh MS
Trumpets Recorded @ Vibe_N Studios Engineered by Lokesh Vijayakumar
Additional Vocals - Deepthi Suresh
Backing Vocals - Velu, Shibi Srinivasan

Music Advisor - Ananthakrrishnan
Creative Consultant - Sajith Satya
Session Assistant - Shivakiran S

Recorded at Albuquerque Records, Chennai. 
Engineered by Vinay Sridhar, Srinivasan M, Shivakiran S, Rajesh Kannan
Stem Mastered by Luca Pretolesi at Studio DMI, Las Vegas, Assisted by Alistair
Music Coordinator - Velavan B

snippet.title: When Desis Go To KOREA For The First Time
snippet.description:
Register for Odoo Community Days - https://www.odoo.com/r/2FXk

We went to Seoul, South Korea and experienced everything that the city had to offer. From Korean salons to colour analysis studios to even BTS Tourist locations.

Follow us on Instagram -
Gautami - https://www.instagram.com/gautamikawale/
Abhyudaya - https://www.instagram.com/abhyudaya_mohan/

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/slayypoint/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SlayyPoint
Twitter - https://twitter.com/slayypoint

Subtitles by Nitika (available within 1-2 days of upload)

E-mail for BUSINESS ENQUIRES ONLY- slayypointofficial@gmail.com

Please don‚Äôt visit the pages/videos of any of these people to spread negativity nor to spam comments on their work, we all are just having some light-hearted fun that stays & ends here, no hate intended, ever!
Enjoy :)

Watch our videos -

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Cc_u0y1Jw8&pp=ygULc2xheXkgcG9pbnQ%3D
Indian School Farewells Have Gone Wild

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDdNwweI_Gg&pp=ygULc2xheXkgcG9pbnQ%3D
Worst Indian Copies of Famous Restaurants

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eBlK58wf-0A&t=263s&pp=ygULc2xheXkgcG9pbnQ%3D
Maggi Will Never Be The Same Again

3 tahun dedikasi tanpa henti, 250 hari pengambilan gambar, didorong oleh iman dan kerja keras.

ms.title: Ia sudah selesai di Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
ms.description:
üîä Tersedia dalam pelbagai format audio  
üåç Tonton dalam Kannada, Hindi, Inggeris, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam  

Dari tanah kita ke skrin dunia ‚Äî itulah selalu impiannya.  
3 tahun dedikasi tanpa henti, 250 hari penggambaran, didorong oleh iman dan kerja keras.  
Penggambaran Kantara Bab 1 selesai hari ini.  
Perjalanan tidak berakhir di sini... ia baru sahaja bermula.  
Epik Ilahi India akan ditayangkan di seluruh dunia pada 2 Oktober.

 üåç Bukela ngesiKannada, isiHindi, isiNgesi, isiTelugu, isiTamil kunye nesiMalayalam

 Ukusuka kumhlaba wethu ukuya kwizikrini zehlabathi-yayisoloko iliphupha elo.
 Iminyaka emi-3 yokuzinikela okungapheliyo, iintsuku ezingama-250 zokudubula, ziqhutywa lukholo nokusebenza nzima.
 Ukudutyulwa kweKantara Isahluko 1 esonga namhlanje.
 Uhambo alupheli apha... lusaqala.

sw.title: Ni Mazungumzo kuhusu Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Filamu za Hombale | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Lokna
sw.description:
üîä Inapatikana katika miundo mingi ya sauti
 üåç Tazama katika Kikannada, Kihindi, Kiingereza, Kitelugu, Kitamil na Kimalayalam

 Kutoka kwenye udongo wa ardhi yetu hadi kwenye skrini za dunia - hiyo ilikuwa daima ndoto.
 Miaka 3 ya kujitolea bila kuchoka, siku 250 za risasi, zinazoendeshwa na imani na kazi ngumu.
 Risasi ya Kantara Sura ya 1 inakamilika leo.
 Safari haiishii hapa... ni mwanzo tu.
 Epic ya Kiungu ya India Inayotolewa ulimwenguni kote mnamo Oktoba 2.

nl.title: Het is een Wrap op Kantara A Legend Hoofdstuk-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
nl.description:
üîä Beschikbaar in meerdere audioformaten  
üåç Kijk in Kannada, Hindi, Engels, Telugu, Tamil en Malayalam  

Van de grond van ons land naar de schermen van de wereld ‚Äî dat was altijd de droom.  
3 jaar van onophoudelijke toewijding, 250 dagen van filmen, gedreven door geloof en hard werken.  
De opnames van Kantara Hoofdstuk 1 eindigen vandaag.  
De reis eindigt hier niet... het begint pas echt.  
India's Goddelijke Epische Film wereldwijd uit op 2 oktober.

sm.title: O se afifi i luga o Kantara A Tala Mataupu-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
sm.description:
üîä E maua i le tele o fa ªalogo leo
 üåç Matamata ile Kannada, Hindi, Igilisi, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam

 Mai le eleele o lo tatou fanua e oo atu i pupuni o le lalolagi - o le miti lava lena.
 3 tausaga o le tuuto faifaipea, 250 aso o fana, fa ªamalosia e le fa ªatuatua ma le galue malosi.
 O le fanaina o Kantara Chapter 1 ua afifi i le aso.
 E le gata ai iinei le faigamalaga... ua na o le amataga lava.
 Le Fa'asalalauga Fa'aleagaga a Initia i le lalolagi atoa ia Oketopa 2nd.

üé¨ Movie Credits:
Movie: Saiyaara
Starring: Ahaan Panday, Aneet Padda
Director: Mohit Suri
Producer: Akshaye Widhani

Story And Screenplay: Sankalp Sadanah

Background Music: John Stewart Eduri
Action Director: Aejaz Gulab
Casting Director: Shanoo Sharma
Visual Effects Studio: yFX
Trailers & Promos: Mohit Sajnaney
Release Date: 18 July 2025

Synopsis:
Yash Raj Films‚Äô Saiyaara is an intense love story, that launches Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda as the next YRF hero and heroine respectively. 

Directed by Mohit Suri, a master of the romance genre, Saiyaara tells a pure-hearted love story of two youngsters Vaani and Krish. While Vaani writes, Krish sings and they both make music together. Though poles apart in their lives, beliefs and backgrounds, Vaani and Krish are perfect with each other and for each other. Will they understand that truth despite their age, their problems? 

They say flawed, imperfect people make for a perfect love story‚Ä¶and Saiyaara is about celebrating that one love story that is so deep, so pure and so caring that it is absolutely unconditional.

Vaani and Krish will have to navigate life, their problems, their insecurities to hopefully realise that only love can be the answer to everything. Saiyaara is a film that celebrates every season of love through the eyes of Vaani & Krish and poses a simple question‚Ä¶do you love someone so much that you would bet everything to keep that person in your life?

snippet.description:
‡¥ö‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡¥Æ‡µç‡¥™‡µÅ‡¥¥‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥ü‡µÜ ‡¥ï‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥§‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥ì‡¥£‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥æ‡¥ü‡µç‡¥ü‡µÅ‡¥Æ‡µä‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÜ  ‡¥ö‡µä‡¥≤‡µç‡¥≤‡¥ø ‡¥µ‡¥ø ‡¥é‡¥∏‡µç‡¥∏‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥á‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡¥∏‡µÜ‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥Ö‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µç......... #vsachudanandhan #vsachuthanandan  #innocent #kairalitv #kairalinews
V.S. Achuthanandan, former Chief Minister of Kerala
Achuthanandan served as Chief Minister of Kerala from 2006 to 2011. He had withdrawn from public life after suffering a minor stroke in 2019 and had since been living with his son in Thiruvananthapuram. His body was shifted from the AKG Centre for Research and Studies to his son's residence and will be lying in state at the Durbar Hall before his funeral cortege departs on Tuesday afternoon. 
Achuthanandan is remembered as a towering figure in Kerala's communist movement, known for his resilience, integrity, and commitment to the working class. He was also a prominent voice against corruption and environmental issues

snippet.title: COLORFUL JUICE | 10 VARIETY of Healthy Juices | Summer Health Drink | Natural Refreshing Fresh Juice
snippet.description:
Today in our village, we prepared 10 colorful and healthy juices using fresh fruits and natural ingredients. These refreshing summer drinks help you stay cool and hydrated with no artificial flavors or colors added.

We made Orange Juice, Red Dragon Fruit Juice, White Dragon Fruit Juice, Mango Juice, Apple Juice, Pineapple Juice, Cucumber Lemonade, Mixed Flavoured Juice, Grape Juice, and Kiwi Juice. Each juice is filled with natural goodness, bright colors, and a unique taste.

snippet.title: Pawan Kalyan Speech | Hari Hara Veera Mallu Pre Release Event | Nidhhi Agerwal | AM Rathnam
snippet.description:
Pawan Kalyan Speech at Hari Hara Veera Mallu Pre Release Event on Mythri Movie Makers.

Hari Hara Veera Mallu is an Upcoming 2025 PAN India Movie Starring Pawan Kalyan, Nidhhi Agerwal and Others. A film by Jyothi Krisna. Produced by A Dayakar Rao under Mega Surya Production. Music by MM Keeravani. Presented by AM Rathnam.

In Cinemas Worldwide from July 24th, 2025.

NIZAM RELEASE BY MYTHRI DISTRIBUTORS LLP.

#HariHaraVeeraMalluPreReleaseEvent #HariHaraVeeraMallu #PawanKalyan #NidhhiAgerwal #JyothiKrishna #AMRathnam #MMKeeravani #ADayakarRao #MegaSuryaProductions #MythriMovieMakers #LatestTeluguMovies2025 #MythriDistributorsLLP

#taarakmehtakaooltahchashmah #‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§ö‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ #sonyliv #comedy #comedy2025 #jethalal #jethalalcomedy #tmkoc #taarakmehtakaooltahchashmah 

About The Show:
----------------------------
Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah is a comedy show inspired by the famous humorous column 'Duniya Ne Undha Chashmah' written by the eminent Gujarati writer Mr. Tarak Mehta. This show revolves around the Gada Family which consists of uneducated businessmen Jethalal Champaklal Gada, Jethalal‚Äôs Wife Daya & their naughty Son Tipendra Gada living in 'Gokuldham Co-operative Society' and covers topical issues which are socially relevant. In case of a problem and emergency, Jethalal Gada often rushes to Taarak Mehta to seek his help and guidance as he finds a philosopher in him. The residents of the housing society, help each other find solutions when they face common, real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

Click here to watch episodes from TMKOC: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn5vww_8o5KvwSUVzj-acz0LGKl6EUjgj

snippet.title: Laadla (1994) Full Hindi Movie (4K) Sridevi & Anil Kapoor & Raveena | Farida Jalal | Bollywood Movie
snippet.description:
Laadla is a 1994 Indian Bollywood action drama film, directed by Raj Kanwar and produced by Nitin Manmohan. The film stars Anil Kapoor, Sridevi, and Raveena Tandon in pivotal roles. And Farida Jalal, Aruna Irani, Anupam Kher, Prem Chopra, Paresh Rawal, Mohnish Behl, Shakti Kapoor, Alok Nath, Arun Bakshi others in supportive role. It is known for its strong dialogues, emotional story and powerful performances.

The story revolves around Raju (Anil Kapoor), a hardworking and principled man who is hired by a ruthless and arrogant factory owner, Sheetal (Sridevi). Their personalities clash due to their different ideologies. Raju believes in honesty and humanity, while Sheetal believes in power and control. Their constant conflict leads to unexpected developments, including a dramatic marriage twist that changes their lives.

localized.description:
Laadla is a 1994 Indian Bollywood action drama film, directed by Raj Kanwar and produced by Nitin Manmohan. The film stars Anil Kapoor, Sridevi, and Raveena Tandon in pivotal roles. And Farida Jalal, Aruna Irani, Anupam Kher, Prem Chopra, Paresh Rawal, Mohnish Behl, Shakti Kapoor, Alok Nath, Arun Bakshi others in supportive role. It is known for its strong dialogues, emotional story and powerful performances.

The story revolves around Raju (Anil Kapoor), a hardworking and principled man who is hired by a ruthless and arrogant factory owner, Sheetal (Sridevi). Their personalities clash due to their different ideologies. Raju believes in honesty and humanity, while Sheetal believes in power and control. Their constant conflict leads to unexpected developments, including a dramatic marriage twist that changes their lives.

snippet.title: Pawan Kalyan Speech | Hari Hara Veera Mallu Grand Press Meet | Nidhhi Agerwal | AM Rathnam
snippet.description:
Pawan Kalyan Speech at Hari Hara Veera Mallu Grand Press Meet on Mythri Movie Makers.

Hari Hara Veera Mallu is an Upcoming 2025 PAN India Movie Starring Pawan Kalyan, Nidhhi Agerwal and Others. A film by Jyothi Krisna. Produced by A Dayakar Rao under Mega Surya Production. Music by MM Keeravani. Presented by AM Rathnam.

In Cinemas Worldwide from July 24th, 2025.

NIZAM RELEASE BY MYTHRI DISTRIBUTORS LLP.

#HariHaraVeeraMalluGrandPressMeet #HariHaraVeeraMallu #PawanKalyan #NidhhiAgerwal #JyothiKrishna #AMRathnam #MMKeeravani #ADayakarRao #MegaSuryaProductions #MythriMovieMakers #LatestTeluguMovies2025 #MythriDistributorsLLP

snippet.title: Aarush Laila in ROAST MODE For 2 Hours |  @sadhikasehgal  | Aarush Laila Podcast | @aarushbhola17
snippet.description:
Aarush & Laila are BACK‚Äîand this time, it‚Äôs personal, hilarious, and completely unfiltered. From Delhi boys‚Äô raw banter to deep friendship talks, this episode with host Sadhika Sehgal is packed with madness, emotion, and chaos.

They kick off by revisiting the prank they pulled on Manmansh Judeja, and quickly spiral into everything from acting gay, talking about virginity, to emotional revelations like Aarush buying his first house and the bond he shares with his dad, who Laila calls ‚Äúthe friend we never had.‚Äù

Expect savage birthday pranks (yes, the fake bike gift happened), awkward confessions (who Laila would date if he were gay), and brutal honesty about relationships - including why Aarush hates Laila‚Äôs girlfriend and thinks he deserves better. Aarush even exposes how Laila shares his live location with her 24/7, calling it toxic love at its peak.

You‚Äôll hear wild stories of Laila almost getting arrested, calling his married ex while drunk, and getting slapped more than once, while Aarush remains surprisingly untouched by trouble. From gym talk to their very different music tastes, approaching girls at the gym, and even their gym playlists‚Äînothing is off-limits. We also get a peek into their spiritual sides, with stories about Vrindavan trips, Lord Krishna, and Hanuman bhakti.

They spill tea on fake influencers, industry rivalry, and their Samay Raina‚Äôs India‚Äôs Got Latent Show experience.

They end with future dreams‚ÄîNetflix series auditions, acting goals, their love languages, and the most chaotic Manali trip ever‚Äîthink fire extinguishers, scared friends, and hotel staff complaints.

From friendship after 30, trusting each other with their girlfriends, to Delhi food recommendations and relationship red flags, this episode is a full ride - messy, meaningful, and made for everyone who‚Äôs ever had a best friend they can fight and laugh with at the same time.

Timestamps:-

snippet.title: Romeo S3 - Full Movie | Palak Tiwari, Thakur Anoop Singh | Pen Movies | New Hindi Movie 2025
snippet.description:
Romeo‚ÄØS3, directed by Guddu Dhanoa and produced by Pen‚ÄØStudios and Wild‚ÄØRiver‚ÄØPictures, is an adrenaline-fueled Hindi action thriller set in the underworld of Goa.
Thakur‚ÄØAnoop‚ÄØSingh stars as DCP Sangram‚ÄØSingh‚ÄØShekhawat, a fearless cop who goes undercover to dismantle a dangerous drug cartel while uncovering a sinister virus-linked conspiracy.
Opposing him is Palak‚ÄØTiwari‚Äôs investigative journalist, Tanu, whose dogged pursuit of truth pulls her into Sangram‚Äôs high-stakes mission.
Packed with explosive fight scenes, high-speed chases, and larger-than-life stunts, the film delivers classic masala action in a bold, cinematic.
While praised for its sheer energy and punchy performances, critics note the storyline sometimes leans on predictable tropes and formulaic twists.

snippet.title: Saiyaara Movie REVIEW | Deeksha Sharma
snippet.description:
Saiyaara Movie Review By Deeksha Sharma. Ahaan Panday & Aneet Padda in Mohit Suri Film Saiyaara Hits back at Aashiqui 3 Similarities with Strong Emotions, Soul-Full Music & 2 Debut Real Actors prepared for a Nostalgic Bollywood Rom-Com Ending, 1 Musician 1 heart broken writer teams up for life & love only to be challenged in a never seen before tragedy! Uski mahima se nyari
Subeh shyam rattu jau su naam uska
Hoke masti mein choor
Rave bhakti mein choor
Aur bhulu Koni Kade Vi Mai Dhaam Uska
Mai su shivji ka das
Uka dere mein re vaas
Baba aane konya deve
Kade kasht bawli
Mai su bhole ka pujari
Jane duniya ya sari
Bholenath pe karu su mai
Trust bawli re
Mai su bhole ka pujari
Jane duniya ya sari
Bholenath pe karu su
Mai trust bawli

snippet.title: What Forced Jagdeep Dhankhar To 'Quit' As Vice President? | Crisis Brewing For BJP? | Akash Banerjee
snippet.description:
For the first time in the history of India - has a VP quit (forced to resign?) from office. Earlier a VP quit - only to contest a Presidential election ... but Dhankhar had 2 more years to his term.
Considered as a hardcore BJP loyalist, he allegedly went our of his way for the party - then what went wrong in the Jagdeep Dhankhar - Narendra Modi equation??? What will Dhankhar be remembered for and what does this drama speak about Indian politics?

snippet.title: Affair | Maalik | Rajkummar Rao, Manushi Chhillar |Khesari Lal Yadav,Sachin - Jigar, Shradha,Amitabh
snippet.description:
‚è≥ The wait is over!
Presenting Affair ‚Äî the captivating new love song from the movie Maalik!
Starring Rajkummar Rao and Manushi Chhillar, Affair is a passionate tale of love, desire, and secret emotions. With dynamic vocals by Khesari Lal Yadav, Shradha Mishra, and Sachin-Jigar, the song is elevated by the soulful composition of Sachin-Jigar and heartfelt lyrics by Amitabh Bhattacharya.

Stay updated with the latest videos from Tips Official, Subscribe on the below link.
http://youtube.com/tipsofficial

Song Details : 
Music: Sachin-Jigar 
Singers: Khesari Lal Yadav, Shradha Mishra & Sachin - Jigar
Lyrics: Amitabh Bhattacharya 
Programmed & Arranged :- Sachin - Jigar
Additional Programmer- Abhishek Singh (White Noise Collectives) 
Recording Engineer: Swar Mehta & Susmeet Rewaskar (White Noise Collectives)
Mixed & Mastered: Eric Pillai 
Assistant Mix Engineer: Michael Edwin Pillai
Director of Choreography - Piyush - Shazia
Assistant Choreographers
* Niyati Raval
* Nandika Dubey
* Prashant Acharya
* Pravin Shinde
* Arun Ghuge
Director‚Äôs spot - Ashik Pinjar

‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•à ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•à - Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Sushmita Sen ‡•õ‡§¨‡§∞‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§® - Biwi No.1 - Hindi ‡•õ‡§¨‡§∞‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®

Get ready for a rollercoaster of emotions with Biwi No.1 (1999), a delightful comedy directed by David Dhawan. This film features an ensemble cast including Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Sushmita Sen, Anil Kapoor, and Tabu, delivering a perfect blend of humor and drama.

The story revolves around Prem (Salman Khan), a wealthy man leading a blissful life with his wife Pooja (Karisma Kapoor) and their two children. Their idyllic existence is disrupted when Prem becomes infatuated with Rupali (Sushmita Sen), a glamorous model. As Prem's extramarital affair unfolds, Pooja discovers the betrayal and, with the help of her supportive family and friends, devises a plan to win back her husband and restore her family's happiness. The narrative explores themes of love, trust, and the importance of family bonds, all wrapped in a comedic package. 

Biwi No.1 was both a critical and commercial success, becoming the second highest-grossing Hindi film of 1999. The film received several accolades, with Sushmita Sen winning the Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of Rupali. The movie's soundtrack, composed by Anu Malik, also contributed to its widespread popularity. 

Experience the laughter, tears, and ultimate redemption in Biwi No.1 (1999)!

‚óæ Music: Anu Malik
‚óæ Genre: Comedy, Drama
‚óæ Language: Hindi

snippet.description:
Straight from the heart of the pind, Sabba drops 'Village Flow', a desi anthem full of pride, passion, and pure Punjabi swag! This isn‚Äôt just another track ‚Äî it‚Äôs a celebration of Sabba‚Äôs roots and rise.

Is vaar gall sirf beats di nahi ‚Äì ae taan Sabba Da Lanter ae, jisnu vekh ke poora pind hi nach paeya! üî•

Credits :

Speed Records Presents
Song - Village Flow

Direction/Concept?Screenplay : Sahil Sharma

Dop : Pardeep Potter

Digital Managed By Scope Entertainment

Reel Promotions By Scope Digital
Label - Speed Records

Lyrics :
Ni baitha mai trakki de mathe ch jhanda gaddke
Ni utte nahio aaya thalle kise de vi laggke
Oh hun mera changa aaya kehnde pair chhad gya
Ni jehde maade time ch gye si hath chhadke
Oh lanka nahio dhayi bhave bheti aa harek de
Ni mere saale kinne hi jo bahre pye aa hate de
Ni bahoteya de rang udd janda kude face to
Ni charno da dohta baitha gaddi vich vekhke
Ho vekhi mardanya eh rang kartar de
Oh aap mar jande jehde doojeya nu maarde
Ho bahn jihdi fadi hove neeli Chhatt wale ne
Ni kitho sutt hona a laler nehri taarke
Oh chhetti hath aunde nahio uchiya udariyaan
Ni reejh na pugaiye asi vair nale yaariyan
Oh vairi voori vekhke badak maar dyidi
Ni kudi jandi vekh kde whistlaan ni maariyan
Ni gabhru rakaane bebe bapu ji to baahre na
Na saade kolo vaade hone lagne ve laare na
Ni tere kolo main vi tere maa-pe charwaune na
Te mere kolo ranjhe wangu pashu jaane chaare na
Na dil to greeb bhave bhute na ameer ni
Aa jehde nal bhai kathi kri na mandeer ni
Ni susti na nede tede mitran de laggdi 
Ni 24 ghante lor vich rehnda ae sareer ni
Ni bhaiyan te yakeen security jeyo z te
Ho bade dil lutte akh mittraa di red ne
Ho dabb nal lgga jo rakaane 30 bore da
Flower bna dewe bhaida eh forehead te
Na nimm jehe lot aune mitthi teri talk to
Na pighluga dil eh jwaani teri hot to
Dass fer sher da ni rutba ki reh gya
Je oh vi gya pattya rakaane cat walk to
Oh zindgi nu reejha nal maande aa baithke
Koi chakkr ni meeru bai khada jado back te
Ho asi befikre 9 10 vje sojiye
Ni sathon gallan adhi raat honiya ni chat te
Ni chattya ni kde v yaara ne billo thukk ke
Oh jo vi kita shar-e-aam kreya ni lukk ke
Oh Kayi saale raula pake kehn asi ki aa
Te sara kujh dssya ae mittra di chupp ne
Jo tappde aa salya nu shittra di ghaat ni
Oh fer vekhi baith jaane sara chupp chaap ni
Ohh kehnde ne ke saade naalo vadda koi vaily ni
Te Dhaai saah ne ch*** de utte bhora maas ni
Neet saaf rabb ne vi kujh ni lakoya kude
Tension ni len koi dinda bai saroya kude
Dhannwaad karda va saareya da dil to
Haaye pauna si punjab kattha lentar te hoya kude
Ho dunia ta jitti baitha hun kithe haar da
Jhool jhool ture kude pota jagtar da
Oh jihna hun takk aukh vich hi aa kattli
Ni maapeya nu geda mai lwauna ik bahar da
Ho guru ghar jaake bhala sareyaa da mangda
Ho adhi cho vi adhi cheej doojeya na vand da
Ho mai ni kehnda rabb bahla deyi jawe menu
Jinna mera banda onna hi ohto mangda

Ho dabb nal lgga jo rakaane 30 bore da
Flower bna dewe bhaida eh forehead te
Na nimm jehe lot aune mitthi teri talk to
Na pighluga dil eh jwaani teri hot to
Dass fer sher da ni rutba ki reh gya
Je oh vi gya pattya rakaane cat walk to
Oh zindgi nu reejha nal maande aa baithke
Koi chakkr ni meeru bai khada jado back te
Ho asi befikre 9 10 vje sojiye
Ni sathon gallan adhi raat honiya ni chat te
Ni chattya ni kde v yaara ne billo thukk ke
Oh jo vi kita shar-e-aam kreya ni lukk ke
Oh Kayi saale raula pake kehn asi ki aa
Te sara kujh dssya ae mittra di chupp ne
Jo tappde aa salya nu shittra di ghaat ni
Oh fer vekhi baith jaane sara chupp chaap ni
Ohh kehnde ne ke saade naalo vadda koi vaily ni
Te Dhaai saah ne ch*** de utte bhora maas ni
Neet saaf rabb ne vi kujh ni lakoya kude
Tension ni len koi dinda bai saroya kude
Dhannwaad karda va saareya da dil to
Haaye pauna si punjab kattha lentar te hoya kude
Ho dunia ta jitti baitha hun kithe haar da
Jhool jhool ture kude pota jagtar da
Oh jihna hun takk aukh vich hi aa kattli
Ni maapeya nu geda mai lwauna ik bahar da
Ho guru ghar jaake bhala sareyaa da mangda
Ho adhi cho vi adhi cheej doojeya na vand da
Ho mai ni kehnda rabb bahla deyi jawe menu
Jinna mera banda onna hi ohto mangda

***Connect With Us**

***About Our Channel***

Van life is very common in western countries. So in this channel at E Bull Jet, we are featuring van life in India. This channel will showcase the real-life in India and nearby countries.

We are Abin and Libin, siblings belonging to Irutty, a locality in Kannur District of Kerala, India. We aim to explore India and nearby countries in a van that's converted into a home. In this journey, we will sleep, cook, and travel in our van and will ex cover places at minimal expenses.  

We would like to bring our Van life though this channel - E BULL JET

snippet.title: Stranger Things 5 | Official Teaser | Netflix
snippet.description:
Every battle has led to this.

More about Stranger Things 5:
The fall of 1987. Hawkins is scarred by the opening of the Rifts, and our heroes are united by a single goal: find and kill Vecna. But he has vanished ‚Äî his whereabouts and plans unknown. Complicating their mission, the government has placed the town under military quarantine and intensified its hunt for Eleven, forcing her back into hiding. As the anniversary of Will‚Äôs disappearance approaches, so does a heavy, familiar dread. The final battle is looming ‚Äî and with it, a darkness more powerful and more deadly than anything they‚Äôve faced before. To end this nightmare, they‚Äôll need everyone ‚Äî the full party ‚Äî standing together, one last time.

Watch on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/title/81297917

snippet.title: Inside India's BIGGEST Festival with 30 Lakh People! ü§Ø (Pandharpur Wari)
snippet.description:
Pandharpur Wari 2025 ‚Äì A Spiritual Journey with 30 Lakh Devotees

In this immersive documentary, we dive deep into the heart of the Pandharpur Wari. Here's what we explored:

üî∏ 30 Lakh+ People Walking for Days ‚Äì A sea of faith marching towards Pandharpur
üî∏ Lived Among the Warkaris ‚Äì Visited and documented how people live in tents during the yatra
üî∏ Witnessed the Sacred Ringan ‚Äì A divine ritual where a riderless horse representing the soul of a saint runs through the crowd, symbolizing devotion and energy
üî∏ Spoke to Warkaris ‚Äì Heartfelt conversations with devotees who walk hundreds of kilometres out of pure devotion
üî∏ Walked 10 km Everyday ‚Äì Experienced the physical and emotional journey ourselves
üî∏ Uncovered Mysterious Stories ‚Äì Legends, miracles, and untold tales of the Wari
üî∏ Revealed the Truth Behind the Name 'Vitthal' ‚Äì An exploration into the meaning, history, and significance of Vitthal Mauli
üî∏ Stories of Sant Tukaram & Sant Dnyaneshwar ‚Äì And many other saints whose teachings guide the Warkari tradition even today

This is more than a documentary ‚Äì it‚Äôs a glimpse into the soul of Maharashtra.

üôè Jai Mauli!

üé¨ Credits:

Directed by: mahesh keshwala
Song : Dindi (pravin koli - yogita koli) @PravinKoli  
Cinematography: sumit barbudhe, dhairya thakkar

Edited by: mahesh keshwala

Research & Script: karan deogharkar, mahesh keshwala

colorist : mihir bhanushali

Thumbnail & Poster Design: aanchal designs

Special Thanks:
‚Äì All the Warkaris who shared their stories & khairenagar dindi number 87
‚Äì  Local Friends From Pandharpur who guided us and helped with the drone shots!

snippet.title: Every Worker Needs to Know This! | ESIC | Dreamz Unlimited
snippet.description:
The Employees‚Äô State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) is a government-run social security and health insurance scheme designed to protect Indian workers. Under the ESI Act, 1948, it provides financial and medical benefits to employees and their families in times of sickness, maternity, disability, or death due to employment injury.
This video explains how the scheme works and the key benefits you should know about.
‚úÖ Medical Benefits ‚Äì Free treatment for employees and their dependents
‚úÖ Sickness Benefit ‚Äì 70% of wages during certified medical leave
‚úÖ Maternity Benefit ‚Äì Paid leave for pregnant women
‚úÖ Disablement Benefit ‚Äì Financial aid in case of injury at work
‚úÖ Dependants‚Äô Benefit ‚Äì Monthly pension for the family in case of death
‚úÖ Funeral Expenses ‚Äì One-time payment for funeral costs
‚úÖ Vocational Rehabilitation ‚Äì Support for disabled employees to regain employment
Whether you're an employee or employer, this is a must-watch to understand your rights and responsibilities under ESIC.

snippet.title: UK & Europe Trains Are Not What I Expected | Unscripted StandUp Comedy "Rant" by Rahul Dua | 2025
snippet.description:
Coming to 14 cities across UK & Europe in Sept'25 with my comedy special Allow Me! Tickets: https://linktr.ee/therahulduatour

Germany ka train system + UK ki train strike = Confused Indian traveler ka breakdown üòÖ. 
In this unrehearsed, unscripted, straight-from-the-heart stand-up bit, I talk about my chaotic Europe tour in 2023 - from Berlin to Munich, Birmingham to London - and how desi expectations just don't match European transport ‚Äúefficiency‚Äù. üò§ I don't think I'd use "punctuality" and "German trains" in the same sentence again :P

No ACs in Europe, sweltering heat, trains that split mid-journey and UK‚Äôs legendary train strike ‚Äî everything that could go wrong, did.
If you‚Äôve ever traveled in Europe, struggled with Bahn systems, or faced sudden cancellations and delays ‚Äî this one‚Äôs for you. Watch till the end for a real life example of "laut k buddhu ghar ko aaye". 

‚úàÔ∏è Have your own Europe travel disaster story? Drop it in the comments! Share it with your friends who are planning a Europe trip or don't stop talking about how good it was. 

Comment the city you have planned to visit and i'll share a tip or two about that city that no one else will. 

üëâ Don‚Äôt forget to Like, Comment, Share & Subscribe for more travel rants and standup comedy! Next standup video coming in less than 2 weeks. 

#StandUpComedy #IndianInGermany #DesiTraveler #IndianComedianAbroad #TrainStrike #EuropeTravelFails  

Shot on 8th Sept 2023 in K√∂ln, Germany
Shot by: Yours Truly and Mehtab Singh, on tour
Sound recording by: Yours Truly and Mehtab Singh, on tour
Editing and Grading by: Gaurav Bhatt ( /@gauravbhatt101)
Sound mixed, mastered and Engineered by: Sreejit Menon ( /@porcupinesree)
Subtitles: Mandream Productions ( /@mandreamproduction)
Thumbnail: Ritik Singh ( /@Ritzdesigns_)
Tour Slate Design: Aryaman Rohilla ( /aryamanrohilla)

Special thanks: Simran Singh, Prateek Rawat, Arjun Singh
